mapper.select: SELECT gs.`id` AS gsid,gs.`detail` AS gsdetail,gs.`name` AS gsname,gs.`img` AS gsimg, gv.id AS gvid,gv.`name` AS gvname,gv.`gid` AS gvgid,gv.column1 AS gvcolumn1,gv.jprice as gvjprice, sd.id AS sdid,sd.`gvid` AS sdgvid,sd.`count` AS sdcount FROM `goods` AS gs INNER JOIN `goodsvalue` AS gv ON gs.`id` = gv.`gid` INNER JOIN `stockdetails` AS sd ON gv.`id` = sd.`gvid` WHERE gv.`id` = #{id}
mapper.sql: id, name, gid, jprice, time, updatetime, uid, state, defaultvalue, enname, column1, column2, column3, column4, column5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from goodsvalue
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goodsvalue (id, name, gid, jprice, time, updatetime, uid, state, defaultvalue, enname, column1, column2, column3, column4, column5 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{defaultvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
